expressions.name: Scale Text inside Shape

expressions.code:
textLayer = thisComp.layer("textLayer"); //our text layer
bbox = textLayer.sourceRectAtTime(time, true); //bounding box around the text
[bbox.width * textLayer.scale[0] / 100, bbox.height * textLayer.scale[1] / 100] + [50, 50] //width of the box plus a little indentation around the edges
